data.title: Scarface: The World Is Yours
data.text:
Developer: Radical Entertainment

Publisher: Sierra Entertainment

Platforms: Windows, PlayStation 2, Xbox, Wii

Released in US: October 10, 2006 (Windows, PS2, Xbox), June 12, 2007 (Wii)

Released in EU: October 13, 2006 (Windows, PS2, Xbox), June 30, 2007 (Wii)

Released in AU: July 19, 2007 (Wii)

Scarface: The World Is Yours is an open-world GTA-style game that ignores the ending of the 1983 movie and focuses on Tony Montana rebuilding his empire.

Prerelease Info

Unused Sounds

Many characters from the film were planned to return in the game and play major roles in its story, only to be scrapped for various reasons.

Mama Montana

Elvira Montana

Tony's wife is referenced many times when he performs taunts, during phone calls, and when he dies in action. She was replaced by Venus, who serves as Tony's love interest in the game, due to Radical being unable to get Michelle Pfeiffer's likeness.
